description: This file defines a script that tests the reliability of a calculator tool within an agent framework by executing a factorial calculation and evaluating the tool call.

classes.name: ReliabilityEval
classes.description: Class used to evaluate the reliability of an agent response.

classes.name: ReliabilityResult
classes.description: Class representing the result of a reliability evaluation.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: Model class representing a Google Gemini model used by the agent.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Class representing the response from the agent run.

classes.name: CalculatorTools
classes.description: Tools class providing calculator functionalities, including factorial.

methods.name: factorial
methods.description: Function that sets up the agent with the Gemini model and CalculatorTools, runs a factorial query, and evaluates the reliability of the tool call.
